name: Creative Logo Design Challenge 2024
description: Design an innovative logo for a tech startup. The logo should represent innovation, technology, and trust. Use modern design principles and color theory.
taskInstruction: Submit your logo design in PNG/SVG format with source files. Include a brief explanation of your design concept (max 200 words).

name: Best Travel Story Writing Contest
description: Share your most memorable travel experience. Write an engaging story that captures the essence of adventure, culture, and personal growth during your journey.
taskInstruction: Write an article between 800-1500 words. Submit as a Google Docs link or PDF. Include at least 3 high-quality images from your trip.

name: Innovative Business Idea Competition
description: Present a unique business idea that solves a real-world problem in Bangladesh. Focus on scalability, market demand, and social impact.
taskInstruction: Submit a business plan (5-10 pages) including: Executive Summary, Problem Statement, Solution, Market Analysis, Revenue Model, and Financial Projections.

name: Mobile Gaming Review Championship
description: Review the latest mobile games with detailed analysis of gameplay, graphics, storyline, and user experience. Help gamers make informed decisions.
taskInstruction: Create a video review (5-10 minutes) or written review (1000-1500 words). Include gameplay footage/screenshots, pros & cons, and rating out of 10.

name: Social Media Post Design Contest
description: Design eye-catching social media posts for Instagram, Facebook, and LinkedIn. Focus on engagement, brand consistency, and visual appeal.
taskInstruction: Submit 5 social media post designs (1080x1080px for Instagram, 1200x630px for Facebook, 1200x627px for LinkedIn). Include source files.

name: Tech Blog Writing Challenge
description: Write an informative tech blog about AI, Machine Learning, or Web Development. Make complex topics easy to understand for beginners.
taskInstruction: Write a blog post (1200-2000 words) with proper headings, code examples (if applicable), and references. Submit as Medium/Dev.to link or Google Docs.

name: Startup Pitch Deck Competition
description: Create a compelling pitch deck for a startup idea. Impress investors with your vision, market opportunity, and execution plan.
taskInstruction: Submit a 10-15 slide pitch deck (PDF or PowerPoint). Include: Problem, Solution, Market Size, Business Model, Team, Financials, and Ask.

name: E-Sports Tournament Review
description: Review major e-sports tournaments like Dota 2 TI, League of Legends Worlds, or PUBG Mobile tournaments. Analyze gameplay, teams, and highlights.
taskInstruction: Submit a detailed tournament review (1500-2000 words or 10-15 minute video). Include match highlights, player analysis, and predictions.

name: Website UI/UX Redesign Challenge
description: Redesign the homepage of a popular e-commerce website. Focus on user experience, conversion optimization, and modern design trends.
taskInstruction: Submit Figma/Adobe XD design file with desktop and mobile versions. Include a brief explanation of design decisions (max 300 words).

name: Motivational Story Writing Contest
description: Write an inspiring story about overcoming challenges, achieving goals, or making a positive impact. Motivate readers to pursue their dreams.
taskInstruction: Write a motivational story (600-1000 words). It can be personal experience or fictional. Submit as Google Docs link or Word document.
